name: THROWBACK (Junkers69)
description:
A short arcade flash inspired game for the GDevelop Game Jam #2. In this game you are tasked with collecting animals and reaching the furthest distance by throwing your animal as far as possible. 

Legend says the Cow is out there!

https://liluo.io/instant-builds/be012e8b-507b-4f99-b569-f4d85806dcd9
